room_visit_order.question_template: Which rooms were visited after {room} at {state}?

object_observation_longest.question_template: Which object was observed for the longest time at {state}?

object_observation_shortest.question_template: Which object was observed for the shortest time at {state}?

room_longest_time.question_template: In which room did the observer stay for the longest time at {state}?

room_shortest_time.question_template: In which room did the observer stay for the shortest time at {state}?

object_first_appearance_earliest.question_template: Among the following objects, which one was first observed earliest at {state}?

object_first_appearance_latest.question_template: Among the following objects, which one was first observed latest at {state}?

object_last_appearance_earliest.question_template: Among the following objects, which one was last observed earliest at {state}?

object_last_appearance_latest.question_template: Among the following objects, which one was last observed latest at {state}?

room_visit_count.question_template: How many times did the observer visit {room} at {state}?

nth_visit_room_area.question_template: What is the area of the room {visit_order} visited at {state}?

nth_visit_room_type.question_template: What is the type of the room {visit_order} visited at {state}?

nth_visit_room_shape.question_template: What is the shape of the room {visit_order} visited at {state}?

nth_visit_room_objects.question_template: Which objects are observed in the room {visit_order} visited at {state}?
